### Part 1

```{r}
questions <- paste(questions, collapse ="\n")

grouped_responses <- 
  strsplit(questions, "\n{2}")

grouped_responses <-
  lapply(
    grouped_responses,
    function(resp) {
      regmatches(resp, gregexpr("\\w", resp))
    }
  )[[1]]

sum(
  sapply(
    grouped_responses,
    function(response) length(unique(response))
  )
)
```
